item.title: GM to Maintain Pricing Strategy, Despite Trump Tariffs
item.description: General Motors Co. says President Donald Trump’s tariffs cost the automaker $1.1 billion in profits. Higher warranty costs and a buildup in inventory of electric vehicles also hurt the figures. But GM
